DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy breast drainage healthy breast new Medela pump set breast shield ( Brownie ) . The objective study verify Brownie breast shield non-inferior current PersonalFit breast shield empty healthy lactate breast .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Brownie Breast Shield Dynamics Milk Removal
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject ≥ 18 year old 2 . Infant ≥1 ≤6 month old 3 . Subject predominantly breastfeed ( 80 % feed , i.e . ≤150 ml formula/day equal representative amount solid food ) 4 . The subject agree pump feed last time minimum 3 hour start pump session study site 5 . The subject agree photographs breast upper body ( face ) 6 . The subject agree perform 24 hour milk production home , inclusive weigh Infant feed 7 . The subject agree collect ~2 ml milk feed fat analysis 8 . The subject sign Informed Consent Form 1 . Mastitis ( breast within two week prior enrolment ) 2 . Engorgement ( breast within two week prior enrolment )
